name: Music_747.wav
keywords: ['drums', 'bass guitar', 'girlish female voice', 'calming synth pad sound', 'orchestra hit']
caption: The music features a girlish female voice singing a sparse melody. The bass guitar and drums drive the pulse of the music but the drums play a more active role in that regard. Towards the middle of the music excerpt a crescendo leading into an orchestra hit can be heard. After this, a calming synth pad sound can be heard providing harmonic context.
